description: An interesting magazine that contains information about swords and sword fighting techniques from all across the world.

variants.description: An interesting magazine that contains information about swords and sword fighting techniques from all across the world.

name.str: Swordfighting, for Writers, Game Designers, and Martial Artists
name.str_pl: copies of Swordfighting, for Writers, Game Designers, and Martial Artists

variants.description: Answers for questions you may have if you never hold a sword in your hands.

name.str: The Beginner's Guide to the Long Sword
name.str_pl: copies of The Beginner's Guide to the Long Sword

variants.description: Based on different europeans martial arts, this book describe the main principles of swordmanship.

name.str_pl: copies of Medieval Combat in Colour

variants.description: Ancient fencing manual with updated draws of techniques.  Sometimes looks silly, describing how to fight if you have sword in one hand, and a spear in another.

description: It seems to be a guide to edged weapon combat, poorly photocopied and released on spiral- bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for beginners.

variants.description: It seems to be a guide to edged weapon combat, poorly photocopied and released on spiral- bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for beginners.
Principles and guides of italian dagger combat, with useful drills and novice advices.

name.str: Knife Fighting Techniques for the Street
name.str_pl: copies of Knife Fighting Techniques for the Street

variants.description: Small book, that contain pretty simple and easy to follow movements to use against your enemy or enemies.
Complete methodology about using knife in the real fight, with tips and tricks.
The books takes some different blade methodologies from europe, asian americas martial arts into unique style.
Lot of knife training methods and techniques for experienced martial artists.

name.str_pl: copies of USMC Sword Manual Procedures

description: A text on stationary sword drills in US Marine Corps.

name.str_pl: copies of USMC Sword Manual Procedure

variants.description: A text on stationary sword drills in US Marine Corps.  Contain lot of information how to draw and pose with sword, but nothing about using it.
Old japanese treatise about swordmanship, translated, polished, with additional illustrations and detailed explanations.

name.str_pl: copies of Records of the Medieval Sword

variants.description: Original research about straight two-edged knightly sword of the European middle ages.
Ancient japanese book of advice about building proper skills and mind for sword fight.  Talks too much about Zen, but sword techniques are worth noting.

name.str_pl: copies of The Art of Longsword Fighting

variants.description: Grounded work about history of swordmanship, ways to teach it and how to enhance students' experience.

name.str_pl: copies of Art of Sword Combat

variants.description: Translation of an old german treatise about using few different cut weapons in a real fight, with modern comments and clarification.
